  • Class
    Description
    CMCCaApi
    The main interface for the CMC API used by a CA service to process a CMC request from a CMC client and to return a suitable CMC response.
    CMCCaApiException
    Exception used within the CMC CA API.
    CMCCertificateModelBuilder
    Default certificate model builder implementation
    CMCMessageException
    Exception class used to signal errors when creating or parsing CMC messages (requests/responses).
    CMCParsingException
    Exception for errors parsing CMC data.
    CMCRequestFactory
    This class provides the logic for creating CMC requests.
    CMCRequestParser
    Parser for CMC Request data
    CMCResponseFactory
    This class is intended to be used as a bean for creating CMC responses.
    CMCResponseParser
    Parser of CMC response data
